page.title: 05GILMERTON
page.content: Gilmerton is situated 2 miles from Crieff. It has developed very slowly over the years and is now like two hamlets joined together with the old and new housing areas. Many of these new houses, owned by the council, are occupied by young families with a few being the homes of retired couples, many of whom were farmers. It is purely a residential area with virtually no services or industries. In the village there is a hotel, a Post-Office/grocery/general store and a phone box. Bus services are however regular but often not frequent enough for some residents. The village is built on a hillside and is surrounded by fertile farmland.
